summary: E-commerce platform for selling skincare items online
architectural_notes: E-commerce platform for online skincare product sales
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner showing natural skincare products with soft lighting and botanical elements (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Facial cleanser product photo with minimalist aesthetic (cleanser-product.dim_400x400.png)
- Moisturizer cream jar on clean background (moisturizer-product.dim_400x400.png)
- Vitamin C serum bottle with elegant styling (serum-product.dim_400x400.png)
- Face mask product with spa-like presentation (mask-product.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog that displays skincare items with product name, description, price, and product image
Implement a shopping cart system where users can add skincare products, view cart contents, update quantities, and remove items
Create a checkout flow that allows users to complete their purchase with order confirmation
Implement product categories or filtering to help users browse skincare items by type (e.g., cleansers, moisturizers, serums, masks)

Design a clean, elegant storefront interface with a cohesive visual theme that reflects skincare and wellness aesthetics, using soft, natural color palettes (such as sage green, cream, and terracotta tones), modern typography, and spacious layouts that emphasize product imagery and readability
Display generated product images and hero banner as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Create e-commerce platform for skincare products
